WITH OrderedPurchases AS ( SELECT TP.PURC_NO, TP.PURC_DT, TP.CUST_CD AS TP_CUST_CD, TPI.ITEM_CD, TPI.QTY, TI.ITEM_COST, TI.ITEM_FLAG, TC.CUST_NM, TI.ITEM_NM, TPI.PURC_COST, TP.PURC_STATUS_CHK,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TP.PURC_NO) AS RowNum FROM TB_PURCHASE TP INNER JOIN TB_PURCHASE_ITEM TPI ON TP.PURC_NO = TPI.PURC_NO INNER JOIN TB_ITEMMST TI ON TPI.ITEM_CD = TI.ITEM_CD INNER JOIN TB_CUSTMST TC ON TC.CUST_CD = TP.CUST_CD WHERE TI.ITEM_FLAG = '01' ) SELECT * FROM OrderedPurchases WHERE RowNum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalCount FROM TB_PURCHASE TP INNER JOIN TB_PURCHASE_ITEM TPI ON TP.PURC_NO = TPI.PURC_NO INNER JOIN TB_ITEMMST TI ON TPI.ITEM_CD = TI.ITEM_CD INNER JOIN TB_CUSTMST TC ON TC.CUST_CD = TP.CUST_CD WHERE TI.ITEM_FLAG = '01'
select DISTINCT tc.* from TB_CUSTMST tc , TB_ITEMMST ti where ti.ITEM_FLAG = 1 AND tc.CUST_CD = ti.CUST_CD
SELECT DISTINCT ttb.*, tc.cust_nm from TB_ITEMMST ti Inner join TB_TYPE_BIG ttb on ti.BIG_NO = ttb.BIG_NO Inner join TB_CUSTMST tc on tc.CUST_CD = ti.CUST_CD where ti.CUST_CD = #{cust_cd}
